forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable.
